inclusion.criterion: pregnant in singleton pregnancy with gestational age > 34 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American society of anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I-II
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of gastrointestinal disorders predisposing to bleeding disorders such as ulcerative colitis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: inflammatory gastrointestinal disorder or a gastrointestinal haemorrhage
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of hypertension in her family. She drinks alcohol frequently but does not smoke.
